Name: Edison's Medicine cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with basil leaf boat floated on cocktail.
Review: Cachaça leads with basil and Chartreuse herbal notes, zesty lime and agave richness.
History: Adapted from a 2011 recipe created by Pete Gugni at The Bedford in Chicago, Illinois.
